items.sentence: Tom certainly looks like he wants to start a fight.
Tom certainly seems to be more effective than Mary.
Tom tries to do some light exercises every morning.
Tom wants to forgive his father for abandoning him.
I can\'t count the number of times I\'ve been here.
Tom and Mary are probably halfway to Boston by now.
Tom and Mary are putting on their coats and gloves.
Tom and Mary both come from dysfunctional families.
I\'m never going to be given the chance to do that.
Neither Tom nor Mary has anything to be ashamed of.
